solution.text:
multiplying _{j}_cosec\(\theta +_{j}_cot\theta\) inside the squared bracket in the numerator and denominator
\({[(_{j}_cosec\theta-_{j}_cot\theta)\times(_{j}_cosec\theta+_{j}_cot\theta)]^2\over (_{j}_cosec\theta+_{j}_cot\theta)^2}\times(1+cos\theta)\over _{k}_-_{k}_cos\theta\)
using the identity \(cosec^2+cot^2=1\) we can simplify
\(_{j}_^4\times(1+cos\theta)\over (_{j}_cosec\theta+_{j}_cot\theta)^2\times(_{k}_-_{k}_cos\theta)\)
we know cosec\(\theta \)=\(1\over sin\theta\)and cot\(\theta \)=\(cos\theta\over sin\theta\)
\([_{j}_\times sin\theta]^2*(1+cos\theta)\over (1+cos\theta)^2\times(_{k}_-_{k}_cos\theta)\)
writing \(sin^2\theta=1-cos^2\theta\) we get
\([_{j}_\times(1-cos^2\theta)]^2\times(1+cos\theta)\over (1+cos\theta)^2\times(_{k}_-_{k}_cos\theta)\)=\(_{{j*j}}_\over _{k}_\)
